dcterms:creator: Richard Futrell
Edward Gibson
Hal Tily
Anastasia Vishnevetsky
Steve Piantadosi
Evelina Fedorenko
dcterms:description: A set of 10 texts (485 sentences) written to sound fluent while still containing many low-frequency and marked syntactic constructions. Self-paced reading data were collected from 181 native English speakers.
dcterms:title: Natural Stories Corpus

dcterms:creator: David Graff
Christopher Cieri
dcterms:description: A large corpus of English newswire text, providing a comprehensive resource for linguistic research.
dcterms:title: Gigaword Corpus

dcterms:creator: Kristina Gulordava
Piotr Bojanowski
Edouard Grave
Tal Linzen
Marco Baroni
dcterms:description: A dataset used to train a recurrent neural network language model on 90 million words from the English Wikipedia.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia Dataset
